trans-unit.source: Represents information related to the scope of data provided by an input method.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.InputScope%2A> properties to get an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputScope> for a particular element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.InputScope%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputScope>特定項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputScope" /> class.
Gets or sets the input scope name.
A member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputScopeName" /> enumeration specifying a name for this input scope.
trans-unit.target: 成員<see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputScopeName" />指定名稱，這個輸入範圍的列舉。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.InputScopeNameValue.Default" />.
Using an input scope name is the simplest way to refer to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputScope> for an element.
trans-unit.target: 使用輸入的領域的名稱是最簡單的方式來參考<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputScope>的項目。

trans-unit.source: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to any value other than a valid member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputScopeName" /> enumeration.
Gets a collection of phrases to be used as suggested input patterns by input processors.
An object containing a collection of phrases to be used as suggested input patterns by input processors.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含片語以作為輸入處理器所建議的輸入模式的集合。

trans-unit.source: This object implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件實作<see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />介面。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
Gets or sets a regular expression to be used as a suggested text input pattern by input processors.
A string that defines a regular expression to be used as a suggested text input pattern by input processors.
trans-unit.target: 字串，定義規則運算式，當做輸入處理器依據建議的文字輸入的模式。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.
Gets or sets a string that specifies any Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) markup to be used as a suggested input pattern by input processors.
A string that specifies any SRGS markup to be used as a suggested input pattern by input processors.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定所有 SRGS 標記做輸入處理器所建議的輸入模式。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
Currently, this property is only applicable to speech input.
trans-unit.target: 目前，這個屬性只適用於語音輸入。

trans-unit.source: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.
